description:
Great that you're taking a look at this Instagram course for artists! We have created this course with care to help artists like you make the most out of Instagram. We have gotten to know many artists working with visuals that would like to use Instagram, but are not sure how to do it. Instagram is an amazing marketing tool for anyone working with visuals, if done right, and we are here to help you with this.

This course is mainly targeted at artists that have never used Instagram before, or want to grow their accounts but are not sure how. We discuss everything from the basics of setting up an account and picking the right username, to how to create great content and grown your account.

At the end of this Instagram course for artists, you will be able to create great content, grow your follower's base, assess the performance of your content and have an engaged followers base for your art! Take this course if you want to become an Instagram pro in little time!!

This Instagram course for artists is approximately 1 hour and is hands-on with many screenshots and clear explanations. In case you run into issues, or Instagram adds new features or drops them, we are more than happy to update the course or answer your questions.
title: Instagram for artists
